list.name: LitmusChaos Events
list.textFormat:
Chaos Details:-

  • Verdict: Awaited
  • Result Namespace: {{chaosresult_namespace}}
  • Instance on which Chaos Engine created jobs: {{instance}}

list.name: LitmusChaos Metrics
list.textFormat:
Chaos Details:-

  • Verdict: {{chaosresult_verdict}}
  • Probe Success %: {{probe_success_percentage}}

App Details:-

  • Engine Context: {{chaosengine_context}}
  • Label: {{app_label}}
  • Kind: {{app_kind}}
  • Namespace: {{app_namespace}}

alert.name: Chaos Experiment Failure
Chaos Experiment Probe Failure Alerts alert
